description: 🚀Hey everyone!! 🔥Excited to share my instagame Clone . It is a responsive application .🚀in this clone you can :
👉SignIn with email/password or with facebook account.
💯Customize your profile( change profile picture ,change the userName and the name ,and add bio to profile).
👉Add posts. ❤️Like & comment in posts also reply on comments.
👉Posts will show up in your profile .
💯Follow / unfollow other users and see their profile as well( see their posts and stories).
✉️Communicate with other users once u add follow them.
✉️See if the other user have seen your last messages .
👉Once you seen storie ,next time you enter to that storie ,it will takes u to the stories u didnt see.
💯See next storie or previous one by clicking in arrow back or arrow forward button.
👉Stories and posts of your followings will show up in your home page.
💯Search for users with that header input.
insta clone.BuiltBY: React.js, styedComponents,Mui ,redux ,firestore ,firebase storage,formik & yup,framer Motion, tailwind ,react router..
